ygData.subject: Re: Banks
ygData.msgSnippet: Personally, I don t have a problem with Twinkies. I ll probably do it myself when my warrior reaches high level. Actually, I gave my roommate (a 5th level
ygData.messageBody:
Personally, I don't have a problem with Twinkies. I'll probably do it myself
when my warrior reaches high level. Actually, I gave my roommate (a 5th
level Shaman) 2 onyx earrings, two pieces of banded, spiked collar, two
cutthroat rings, and a snakeskin tunic just last Wednesday. People I hang
with sometimes have a problem with it. I was with a 18th level Wizard that
ran up to a 3rd level wizard (with a FBR on) and said "DUEL ME!".
Heh...kinda funny. I do think it takes a bit out of the challenge of the
game, and I get on it sometimes that *I* had to work so hard to get where
I'm at (noone gave me anything), but this soon goes away cuz they obviously
played ALOT more than me if they can equip a 3rd level character with a FBR
and other good eq and start anew. And, Verant said, if I remember correctly,
that THEY have a problem with it. I don't know that they said they would do
anything about it, but they said they look down on it. And no, I have no
clue where I saw that...heh.

Just me 2 coppers.

-Zantaer, Fennin Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: davidb@... [mailto:davidb@...]
Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 12:02 PM
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Banks


From: davidb@... (David Burkhart)

Also put yourself in "real life". If I can help a friend, I do. I don't feel
there's anything wrong with helping other people, or yourself.


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mark Guckeyson [mailto:mguckeyson@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 12:50 PM
> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Banks
>
>
> From: mguckeyson@... (Mark Guckeyson)
>
> Out of curiousity, what is your problem with twinking? How does twinking
> degrade your play and or fun? How does it prevent you from doing
> leveling, completing quests, goofing off? If the gear was on a level 50
> PC, how is this better than a level 1 PC?
>
> Just curious, cause personally, I think telling people what they can and
> cannot do with items they own is silly in the first place, and I've
> never noticed any lessening of my enjoyment of the game due to some
> twinking. Well, I've thought to myself "Garsh, it'd sure be nice if *I*
> had that..."
>
> Mark
>
> Lemac Justerian wrote:
> >
> > From: "Lemac Justerian" <lemac@...>
> >
> > Joint bank accounts wouldn't be that great of an idea... For
> the reasons you
> > stated, it would, but it would be abused too easily to help
> *twink* another
> > character up...
> >
>
